import{child}from"@firebase/database";import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{onlineUsersRef}from"../modules/firebase-config";export var opponentRef=null;var userInfoInitialState={isLoggedIn:false,roomStatus:null,//"looking for room" "waiting" "in room"
otherUsers:[],//other users that aren't you
roomKey:null,//key for the room you are in
opponentName:"",// name of your opponent, empty if not in room
opponentID:null,// id of your oppponent, null opponent hasn't been chosen
invitationKeys:[],// keys of rooms that you are invited to
grid:[],// grid of game from opponent
displayText:""};var userInfoSlice=createSlice({name:"UserInfo",initialState:userInfoInitialState,reducers:{reset:function reset(state){state.roomStatus="looking for room";state.otherUsers=[];state.roomKey=null;state.opponentName="";state.opponentID=null;state.invitationKeys=[];state.grid=[];state.myName="";opponentRef=null;},login:function login(state){state.isLoggedIn=true;},logout:function logout(state){state.isLoggedIn=false;},setOtherUsers:function setOtherUsers(state,users){state.otherUsers=users.payload;},setRoomKey:function setRoomKey(state,key){state.roomKey=key.payload;},setRoomStatus:function setRoomStatus(state,newStatus){state.roomStatus=newStatus.payload;},setOpponentName:function setOpponentName(state,opponentName){state.opponentName=opponentName.payload;},setOpponentid:function setOpponentid(state,id){if(id.payload){opponentRef=child(onlineUsersRef,id.payload);}state.opponentID=id.payload;},setInvitiationKeys:function setInvitiationKeys(state,keysList){state.invitationKeys=keysList.payload;},setGrid:function setGrid(state,grid){state.grid=grid;},setDisplayText:function setDisplayText(state,text){state.displayText=text.payload;}}});export var userInfoActions=userInfoSlice.actions;export default userInfoSlice.reducer;
